---
title: Species and Call Types
---

The following table lists marine mammal species and call types for the Northeast Pacific Region. It includes species and call type codes to be used in future analysis and data archives.

::: callout-important
## All analysis should use PACM species codes and call type codes
:::

The PACM/Makara species and call type reference tables can be found in the [Passive Acoustic Reporting System Templates](https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/resource/document/passive-acoustic-reporting-system-templates)

The NMFS/Tethys species abbreviations can be found [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fg4yzSoncXLiwsya98yoJMd0N49nUXKA/view).
